mapper.select: select @rowno:=@rowno+1 as top,rate.car_number as attribute,rate.number as number from ( select @rowno:=0, info.car_number as car_number ,count(*) as number,maintenance.delete_time as m_d,info.delete_time as i_d,maintenance_time from tbl_vehicle_maintenance as maintenance inner join tbl_vehicle_info as info on (maintenance.vehicle_info_id = info.id) group by maintenance.vehicle_info_id HAVING maintenance.delete_time is null and info.delete_time is null and maintenance_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by number desc ) as rate
